text: Uguccione (also Huguccio or Hugutio) may refer to: *Huguccio (d. 1210), canon lawyer and bishop *Uguccione da Pisa (fl. c. 1200), grammarian *Uguccione della Faggiuola (d. 1319), condottiero, ruler of Pisa, Lucca and Forlì *Uguccione Borromeo (d. 1329), bishop of Novara *Francesco Uguccione (d. 1412), archbishop of Bordeaux
title: Uguccione (disambiguation)
